summary: Replaces the Maintheme (Mainmenu Track) with a Halloween-ish tune.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Hi everyone,
since i just uploaded this mod for the SE, i thought i'd upload it
here as well.

A little tune i wrote after i played Skyrim for the last time,
which is quite a while ago.
It ended up quite scary and has a nice "dungeon-feeling" to it.
Anyways, i thought it's a good time to maybe share it,
since its halloween.

Â  Here's a link to the song, if you wanna hear it:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YRfZZroQEec

Enjoy Skyrim and have a great halloween everyone!

[/center]



[center]
[/center]

[center][/center]
author: Silant
